participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are those that help me learn more about asthma and how to manage it.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
i like listening to blues music.
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.

participant_2.background:
I'm not that much into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.
i am pursuing my law degree.
I like to be alone, but I love my baby.
I'm afraid I'll be unable to keep up with my busy schedule.
I spend my free time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love spending time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.
Oh! That sounds exciting. How did you meet?
We met at a concert that my boss was taking me to.
Wow! That's lucky! Are you into music?
Not really, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.
That's cool. I am a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
Oh! That's awesome! What kind of stories do you write?
I like to write fantasy and horror stories.
Oh! That sounds really cool! I love to read.
It's hard to say, but I really enjoyed the Game of Thrones series.
Me too! That's one of my favorite series.
Have you read the Song of Ice and Fire series?
No, I haven't. I've heard good things about it, though.
It's really good! You should check it out.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
